PItems.Value: 台中縣男子陳國華2年前行竊，曾被清水警分局偵查佐范鴻明逮捕過，他前天下午騎贓車前往資源回收場，又被范發現，當場逮捕，陳國華大嘆倒楣，直說：「怎麼又遇上你。」
范鴻明與沙鹿分駐所警員曾錦祥前天下午前往沙鹿鎮興仁街某資源回收場，發現陳國華（32歲）騎著白色贓車，腳踏板載有2塊鐵製水溝蓋，準備賣給資源回收場，陳看見范鴻明時，一臉錯愕，說話支支吾吾。
范隨口問說：「機車，是你買的嗎？」沒想到陳竟然露出恐慌表情，范心知有異，立刻通報查詢，果然是贓車；陳國華表示，2年前偷竊被范逮捕，如今又栽在同一人手中，有夠倒楣。范則表示，只要不做虧心事，何必擔心遇到他。

Headline:
衰！ 兩度行竊
遇到同一員警

PItems.Value: 台中縣男子陳國華2年前行竊，曾被清水警分局偵查佐范鴻明逮捕過，他前天下午騎贓車前往資源回收場，又被范發現，當場逮捕，陳國華大嘆倒楣，直說：「怎麼又遇上你。」

DuplicateArticles.Headline: Floods affect 347,000 people in China's Jiangxi
DuplicateArticles.Snippet: NANCHANG, July 4 (Xinhua) -- Floods starting from Tuesday have affected 347,000 people in east China's Jiangxi Province as of 5 p.m. Saturday, according to the provincial emergency management department.

RelatedArticles.Snippet: NANCHANG, July 4 (Xinhua) -- Floods starting from Tuesday have affected 347,000 people in east China's Jiangxi Province as of 5 p.m. Saturday, according to the provincial emergency management department.

RelatedArticles.Headline: 1st LD-Writethru: Chinese provinces launch emergency response for flood control
RelatedArticles.Snippet: BEIJING, July 3 (Xinhua) -- Central China's Hunan Province launched a Level IV emergency response, the lowest in China's four-tier emergency response system, for flood control on Friday.

RelatedArticles.Copyright: Copyright © 2019 Mansion Global. All Rights Reserved.
RelatedArticles.Headline: 葛洛莉娅·范德比尔特曼哈顿故居削价1000万美元出售; 这栋包含12间卧室的七层联排别墅曾标价5000万美元。
RelatedArticles.Snippet: 近日，美国名媛、时尚设计师葛洛莉娅·范德比尔特(Gloria Vanderbilt)在纽约曼哈顿的幼年故居削价1000万美元重返市场，现标价4000万美元出售。该物业位于上东区勒诺克斯山社区(Lenox Hill)东72街，目前已被改造成三套共管公寓。早在今年7月，这栋联排别墅曾以5000万美元上市，当时由道格拉斯艾丽曼地产公司的经纪人Lauren Muss和其他几位同事联合代理。12月27日，Muss再度将其挂牌上市。

RelatedArticles.Copyright: Copyright N.C.N Limited of Xinhua News Agency 2020. All Rights Reserved.

DuplicateArticles.Headline: Chinese villages draw on officials' wisdom, experience to fight poverty
DuplicateArticles.Snippet: China is determined to eradicate absolute poverty across the country in 2020, which means that around 5.51 million people who remained impoverished at the end of 2019 will be lifted out of poverty by the end of this year.

RelatedArticles.Headline: How Shibadong villagers end poverty and find love | Stories shared by Xi Jinping
RelatedArticles.Snippet: Shibadong village in central China used to be so impoverished that non-local girls were reluctant to marry into the village. However, targeted poverty alleviation programs help villagers shake off poverty and live a new life.

RelatedArticles.Byline: 王宏达,王剑英,范军威,洛登,郝晓江,董硕,邹健波,洛卓嘉措,旦增尼玛曲珠,李桢宇,程济安,邰剑秋,贺新,田里,杨阳

RelatedArticles.Headline: Annular solar eclipse observed in Tibet, China
RelatedArticles.Snippet: Stargazers in Tibet, China are treated to a majestic "ring of fire" solar eclipse. #SolarEclipse2020

RelatedArticles.Headline: World must not forget Tiananmen Square Incident: Taiwan professor
RelatedArticles.Snippet: TAIPEI (CNA) — A Taiwanese scholar said Wednesday that the Tiananmen Square massacre of June 4, 1989 must not be allowed to fade from the minds of people as China would wish, because it is relevant to those seeking security and democracy ...

RelatedArticles.Headline: Private sector in Taiwan urges government to set up new agency to manage digital technology
RelatedArticles.Snippet: TAIPEI (Taiwan News) — Many information technology organizations in Taiwan attended a meeting in Taipei on Wednesday (May 13) to continue their push for the government to set up a new national agency dedicated to managing affairs related to...
